subject: Football
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Rutgers has lost two more games at this point of the season than it had a year ago, dealing a setback to Ray Rice’s Heisman Trophy prospects and dropping the Scarlet Knights out of the top 25.
snippet: Rutgers has lost two more games at this point of the season than it had a year ago, dealing a setback to Ray Rice’s Heisman Trophy prospects and dropping the Scarlet Knights out of the top 25.
